shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when an audio frame is captured.

p.codeblock: virtual bool onRecordAudioFrame(const char* channelId, AudioFrame& audioFrame) = 0;

section.p:
To ensure the format of the captured audio frame meets expectations, you can set the audio data format using one of the following two methods:
Method 1: Call to set the audio data format, and register the audio frame observer object using . The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the set parameters and triggers this callback accordingly.
Method 2: After registering the audio frame observer object using , set the audio data format in the return value of . The SDK then calculates the sampling interval based on the return value of and triggers this callback accordingly. Method 1 takes precedence over Method 2. If Method 1 is used to set the audio data format, the settings in Method 2 are ignored.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: The SDK triggers this callback based on the sampling interval.
